cards.Name: Sprout Road
cards.Description: The Sprout Road Accele-charger grows a living track in front of your car. Cancel all Hazards played againts a vehicle stack as long as Sprout Road remains equipped to that car

cards.Name: Hyper-Jump
cards.Description: Making jet-boosted corrections on the fly, this Accele-Charger allows you to execute a perfect jump every time you catch some air.

cards.Name: Frictionless
cards.Description: This Accele-Charger forms a frictionless sphere of air around the car, dropping wind and road resistance to zero.

cards.Name: Lighting Rod
cards.Description: This Accele-Charger screens out high-voltage attacks, deflecting electrical charges away from a car's vulnerable innards: its circuits, its CPU and you.

cards.Name: Fog Vision
cards.Description: For the Realm in which Fog Vision enters play, you may relocate the SPP ESCAPE VALUE on YOUR SIDE ONLY. Mark new location with a token. Opponent must use the printed Escape Value. Realm r√©tums to normal when Fog Vision

cards.Name: Slip Grip
cards.Description: This Accele-Charger increases the friction of all slippery surfaces, making them as easy to drive on as bone-dry pavement.

cards.Name: Wind Shark
cards.Description: By monitoring atmospheric fluctuations, this Accele-Charger compensates for all wind variations, stabilizing the car in even the strongest of gales

cards.Name: Undistort
cards.Description: The Undistort Accele-Charger pierces any form of illusion, be it mirage, reflection or holographic camouflage technology. When this card comes into play, you may look at your opponent's hand.

cards.Name: Night Sight
cards.Description: Night Sight translates pulsed UV light into VR imaging, allowing a driver to see in total darkness. When this card is brought into play, draw two extra cards from your draw pile for free.

cards.Name: Hydroglide
cards.Description: Plugging in this Accele-Charger creates a static shield around the car, allowing it to glide across - or even through-any liquid environment.

cards.Name: Turn and Burn
cards.Description: This Accele-Charger manipulates a car's power differential so it can safely 'drift' around hairpin turns without sacrificing either speed or power.

cards.Name: Navigator
cards.Description: This Accele-Charger pinpoints the car's position and points unerringly in the right direction. When this card comes into play, you may equip 1 Shift card for free on ANY Vehicle.

cards.Name: Battering Bubble
cards.Description: Modulating the magnetic polarity of your car, this Accele-Charger pushes all obstacles out of your way. Hazards do not affect this vehicle stack while Battering Bubble remains equipped.

cards.Name: Wall Crawl
cards.Description: This Accele-Charger bonds the wheels of the car to the road so that the vehicle 'sticks' to the track - even when the track twists upside down!

cards.Name: Sound Buffer
cards.Description: This Accele-Charger broadcasts complementary sound waves in response to any other sound approaching the car. The result is complete silence, effectively negating any sonic attacks.

cards.Name: Phantom Form
cards.Description: Phantom Form 'ghosts' your car, avoiding collisions by phasing right through solid matter. When this card is brought into play, return a Shift card from your junk pile to your hand.

cards.Name: Light Speed
cards.Description: This Accele-Charger propels the car to Mach speeds and beyond. Watch the rest of the world move in slow motion as you drive at the speed of light!

cards.Name: Impervious Tires
cards.Description: As long as it's equipped, the Impervious Tires Accele-Charger absorbs all damage to the Vehicle's wheels so that they never wear out.

cards.Name: Water Realm
cards.Description: Speeding through race tubes formed of 'solid water', drivers on the Ocean track must contend with hungry aquatic hazards while negotiating an ancient coral reef.

cards.Name: Anti-Gravitation
cards.Effects: The Anti-Gravitation Accele-Charger makes gravity your friend. Turn it on, turn it off - do whatever you need with the laws of physics to float to the head of the pack.

cards.Name: Total Traction
cards.Effects: This Accele-Charger provides enormous traction over WATER, SAND, MUD, SLICK, ROUGH and PAVED terrain.

cards.Name: Folding Corners
cards.Effects: Snap your car through impossible 90 turns! Place a token on this card every turn you spend no APs. Each token adds a +1 to this card's S, P and P values.

cards.Name: 2-D
cards.Effects: Slip through the cracks! When a Hazard is played against you, equip 2-D on the targeted Vehicle to cancel the Hazard and send it to your opponent's junk pile.

cards.Name: Sand Speed
cards.Effects: A binding field from this Accele-Charger temporarily fuses sand or any other unstable surface in front of the car - just long enough for the racer to speed over it in safety.

cards.Name: Teleport
cards.Effects: Warp past danger! Protect a Vehicle stack from Hazards for 3 turns. When Teleport is equipped, place 3 tokens on it and remove 1 each turn during your tune-up phase to track the 3 turns.

cards.Name: Size Scaler
cards.Effects: Shrink or grow your car to squeeze through a tight spot or roll over the top of it! This Vehicle can equip ANY Mod while Size Scaleris equipped, and keeps these Mods when Vehicle advances.
